textBeforeTable: Pie Chart Bar Chart Cumulative Bar Chart 5) Strongly disagree   4) Disagree   3) Not sure/I do not know   2) Agree   1) Strongly agree   In this section, you are asked to express your perceptions and personal views on a number of statements on the teachings of the Church. Please be reminded that this survey is confidential. Please candidly share your views and perceptions by responding to each statement using the following response codes to indicate the extent of your agreement with the statement. -- The biblical account of the Ascension of Jesus does not describe an actual event but tells us in a symbolic way that Jesus was exalted.
